name: Amit Vishwakarma
college: Shri Ram Institute of Science And Technology

full_output.summary: Innovative full-stack developer skilled in React, Node.js, and database management. Eager to leverage expertise in MERN stack and API integration to build scalable web applications. Seeking to contribute to a dynamic tech team.

education.school: Shri Ram Institute of Science And Technology

projects.name: Resunova App
projects.description: Developed for create resume and also download the resume in pdf form. Integrated bcrypt for encrypt the password of the user and also used passport, passport-jwt and jsonwebtoken for user authentication. Contributed to the creation of a user-friendly interface and ensured a smooth user experience throughout resume generation process.

projects.name: E-commerce
projects.description: Built a Front end e-commerce application using redux toolkit and firebase, It offers an intuitive interface for sort product, edit and delete the product. Project Management: Provides an organized overview of projects with timestamps, their issues, enabling seamless CRUD operations - Create, Read, Update, and Delete. Implemented a comprehensive product management module, allowing users to navigate through product details.

projects.name: E Learning API
projects.description: Developed an E-learning API with distinct user and admin sections, incorporating comprehensive CRUD operations. Integrated Claude AI for an interactive query system, where users can ask questions and receive AI-generated solutions in real-time and Utilized Passport-JWT (JSON Web Token) for secure authentication processes for user and admin. Implemented a robust email notification system using an SMTP server for various triggers such as user registration, course enrollment, and password reset token generation.

experiences.description: Working on project where my role is to work on back end. Gained hands-on experience with MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js (MERN stack) for full-stack web development. Developed and maintained backend services using Node.js and Express.js. Implemented and managed RESTful APIs to handle event-driven architectures.

Addressing the students queries, I am working with a tech stack that includes Node.js, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Bootstrap. Debugging the codes and Helping students in their assignments various projects.
Led a team of 20 employees and also work in Ms-Excel, Managed customer interactions, provided feedback. Handled client interactions with a focus on effective communication and professionalism.

full_output.name: Amit Vishwakarma
